hackathon-description-text: Spend a weekend on a team with four other female undergraduate students at Boston University and a professional mentor to build something amazing! At Hack the Gap, we want you to think out of the box, experiment with new technologies, ask questions, learn something new, and have fun!
hackathon-eligibility: - Must have attended both days of the hackathon
hackathon-rules:
No voting for your own project - spread the love
Each student gets one vote

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team will get a polaroid camera!
Each member of the winning team will get a $15 Pavement gift card!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Help us a choose a winner:

hackathon-description-header: A beginner hackathon, for ending the gender gap in technology.
